uncertainties: No compound-identity or empirical hepatotoxicity evidence provided beyond structure (SMILES); this is a structure-based mechanistic prior only.
Bioactivation risk depends on actual metabolic routes (ester hydrolysis vs oxidative metabolism) and enzyme selectivity, which are not known here.
Transporter interaction (e.g., BSEP) is inferred from cationic amphiphilic features and is not experimentally validated.
Temporal phenotype (latency, dose dependence, reversibility) cannot be inferred reliably without exposure and in vivo context.
